description:
Overview

Switches is a mod, by Myrathi, that provides alternative switch designs inspired by SethBling's Bite-Sized Minecraft episodes (Ep.1 & Ep.2).

Minecraft 1.6.4

As of v1.3.0 build 25, Switches supports the 1.6.4 client.

Minecraft 1.6.2

As of v1.2.0 build 21, Switches no longer requires CCC for special piston features (flipping levers and clicking switches).
It still goes into the /mods folder (as there is no /coremods folder in 1.6.2).

Minecraft 1.5.2

As of v1.1.0 build 19, emerald and diamond switch designs were added.

Minecraft 1.5.1

In the earlier versions, only iron and gold switches are available.

How It Works

Switches are placed and respond just like vanilla levers (you can place them on any side of a block).

Right-clicking a switch toggles its state between on and off.

You can toggle a switch (or lever) by having a piston extend directly against it. A retracting sticky piston will also pull a lever back towards itself.

Switches made of different materials do not act differently - it's purely aesthetics!

Recipes

See the FTB wiki page.

Other Mods by Me

You can find a list in my Mod Compendium on the FTB forum or on my CurseForge profile.
name: Switches
